```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = TRUE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(AnnotationHub) # to fetch genomes, annotations, etc.
  devtools::load_all("thingdoer") # load thingdoer libary
})
```

```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = TRUE}
ah <- AnnotationHub()

query_mouse_ensdb <- query(ah, c("Mus musculus", "EnsDb", "GRCm38", "v102"))
query_mouse <- query(ah, c("Mus musculus", "GRCm38", "TwoBit", "dna_sm"))
query_fly <- query(ah, c("Drosophila melanogaster", "BDGP6", "TwoBit", "dna_sm"))

query_mouse_ensdb
query_mouse
query_fly
```

```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = TRUE}
query_mouse_db <- query_mouse_ensdb[[1]]
db_path <- dbconn(query_mouse_db)@dbname
stats <- do_the_thing(db_path)
hist(stats$spliced_lengths, breaks = 100, main = "Spliced lengths of transcripts", xlab = "length bp")
```
